pullrequest.title: Apply Force/Torque dialog: Activate window when visual clicked

content.raw: One thing I noticed is that when I close Gazebo with one or more Force/Torque Dialogs open, the dialog boxes will stick around and I have to manually close them before the gzclient process dies. But that can be addressed in a future pull request.
content.html: One thing I noticed is that when I close Gazebo with one or more Force/Torque Dialogs open, the dialog boxes will stick around and I have to manually close them before the gzclient process dies. But that can be addressed in a future pull request.
